examples.user_story: As a registered user, I want to log in with my email and password so that I can access my account

test_cases.title: Successful login with valid credentials
test_cases.given: User is on the login page AND has a registered account
test_cases.when: User enters valid email and password AND clicks login button
test_cases.then: User is redirected to dashboard AND session is created

test_cases.title: Login fails with invalid password
test_cases.given: User is on the login page
test_cases.when: User enters valid email and incorrect password
test_cases.then: Error message 'Invalid credentials' is displayed AND user remains on login page

test_cases.title: Login fails with non-existent email
test_cases.given: User is on the login page
test_cases.when: User enters email not in system
test_cases.then: Error message 'Account not found' is displayed

test_cases.title: Empty fields validation
test_cases.given: User is on the login page
test_cases.when: User clicks login with empty email or password
test_cases.then: Validation error messages are displayed for empty fields

examples.user_story: As a customer, I want to add items to my shopping cart so that I can purchase multiple products

test_cases.title: Add single item to empty cart
test_cases.given: User is viewing a product page AND cart is empty
test_cases.then: Item is added to cart AND cart count shows 1 AND success message appears

test_cases.title: Add multiple quantities of same item
test_cases.given: User is viewing a product page
test_cases.when: User selects quantity 3 and clicks 'Add to Cart'
test_cases.then: Cart shows 3 units of the product AND total price is calculated correctly

test_cases.title: Add item when out of stock
test_cases.given: Product is marked as out of stock
test_cases.when: User attempts to add item to cart
test_cases.then: 'Add to Cart' button is disabled AND message 'Out of Stock' is displayed

examples.user_story: As an admin, I want to delete user accounts so that I can remove inactive or banned users

test_cases.title: Successful account deletion
test_cases.given: Admin is logged in AND viewing user management page
test_cases.when: Admin clicks delete on a user account AND confirms deletion
test_cases.then: User account is removed from database AND confirmation message appears

test_cases.title: Cancel deletion operation
test_cases.then: Account remains unchanged AND user is returned to management page

test_cases.title: Cannot delete own account
test_cases.given: Admin is viewing their own account
test_cases.when: Admin attempts to delete their own account
test_cases.then: Delete button is disabled OR error message prevents deletion
